name: TweetCaster for Twitter
description: TweetCaster has a gorgeous look with an intuitive interface that makes it super easy to use while packing in tons of features.   * Manage and easily post to multiple accounts * Photo Effects  Add cool filters and captions to photos, as you upload them * Zip It  Remove annoying people or keywords from your timeline without unfollowing * Widgets  Scrollable and resizable * Themes  Twelve vibrant, colorful options * Smart Filter  Filter your timeline to look only at tweets with photos, links, videos, or hide retweets or replies * Search Party  Lets you search just your own timeline, someone elses, or All * Smart Lists  Including robust list management and viewing tools * My Stats  Up-to-the-minute tally for retweets, mentions, and favorites * Photo previews  Supports most image services, including Instagram * Speech to Text  Tap microphone on screen to start * Schedule  Send later or send to Buffer * Read Later  Save links to Pocket, Instapaper, or Readability * Streaming  Your timeline updates real-time when connected via WiFi * Readability  Allows for a mobile-optimized view * Color Coding  Available for Tweets and Mentions * Who to Follow - Top suggestions for your interests  We may collect information from your use of the app that we may share with our partners to deliver personalized ads, and improve our services. This data may be associated with other data collected from your visits over time and across different applications and websites to provide you with relevant and useful advertising.  You may modify your choices at any time as explained in our Privacy Policy: http://tweetcaster.com/privacy/#rights
